long_description: The Oakley Ambush snow goggles feature a spherical lens with a versatile tint for use in medium to bright light and a comfort-focused fit to keep you happy on your all-day sessions on the mountain. Fire Iridium lens has an amber tint, 12% visible light transmission (VLT) and a mirror finish, enhancing contrast and cutting glare in medium to bright light. Spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Antifog treatment and lens vents combat lens fogging, supplying clear vision in changing weather. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Durable frame is made of a conforming, flexibile plastic to ensure a comfortable fit all day long and in changing temperatures. Strap outriggers hinge to create a flush fit that minimizes gaps and distributes pressure evenly across your face. The helmet-compatible design of the Oakley Ambush snow goggles fits small- to medium-size faces.
